DOC.brief_title: Comparison Methotrexate ( MTX ) VIBEX™ MTX Device
DOC.detailed_description: A Phase 2 , Open-Label , Randomized , 3-Way Crossover Study Compare Relative Bioavailability Oral Methotrexate VIBEX™ MTX Device Adult Subjects With Rheumatoid Arthritis
DOC.criteria: Male female patient ≥18 year age , diagnose Rheumatoid Arthritis Pregnant females Any clinically significant disease disorder , opinion investigator might put subject risk
